TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapReflectionImporter extends System.Object

remarks.para: The class provides type mappings to SOAP-encoded message parts, as defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. It is used only when a Web service or client specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

summary.para: Generates mappings to SOAP-encoded messages from .NET Framework types or Web service method information.

MemberSignature.Value: public SoapReflectionImporter ();

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string defaultNamespace) cil managed

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a default XML namespace for imported type mappings.

Docs.param: The default XML namespace to use for imported type mappings.

MemberSignature.Value: public SoapReflectionImporter (System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides attributeOverrides);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides attributeOverrides) cil managed

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying overrides for XML serialization.

Docs.param: A object that overrides how the class serializes mapped types using SOAP encoding.

MemberSignature.Value: public SoapReflectionImporter (System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides attributeOverrides, string defaultNamespace);

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying XML serialization overrides and a default XML namespace.

Docs.param: A object that overrides how the class serializes mapped types using SOAP encoding.
The default XML namespace to use for imported type mappings.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping (string elementName, string ns, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping(string elementName, string ns, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members) cil managed

remarks.para: The method is called while initializing a Web service or client, or reflecting a Web service. You do not need to call it directly.
The following list describes possible values for the parameter:

item.para: Web service method output parameters, plus the return type, if not void, at index zero.

summary.para: Generates internal type mappings for information that is gathered from a Web service method.

returns.para: Internal .NET Framework type mappings to the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

Docs.param: An XML element name produced from the Web service method.
An XML element namespace produced from the Web service method.
An array of .NET Framework code entities that belong to a Web service method.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping (string elementName, string ns, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members, bool hasWrapperElement, bool writeAccessors);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping(string elementName, string ns, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members, bool hasWrapperElement, bool writeAccessors) cil managed

remarks.para: The method is called while initializing a Web service or client, or reflecting a Web service. You do not need to call it directly.
The following list describes possible values for the parameter:

item.para: Web service method output parameters, plus the return type, if not void, at index zero.

summary.para: Generates internal type mappings for information that is gathered from a Web service method.

returns.para: Internal .NET Framework type mappings to the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

Docs.param: An XML element name produced from the Web service method.
An XML element namespace produced from the Web service method.
An array of .NET Framework code entities that belong to a Web service method.
true to indicate that elements that correspond to WSDL message parts should be enclosed in an extra wrapper element in a SOAP message; otherwise, false.
true to indicate an RPC-style Web service binding; false to indicate a document-style Web service binding or a SOAP header.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping (string elementName, string ns, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members, bool hasWrapperElement, bool writeAccessors, bool validate);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping(string elementName, string ns, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members, bool hasWrapperElement, bool writeAccessors, bool validate) cil managed

remarks.para: The method is called while initializing a Web service or client, or reflecting a Web service. You do not need to call it directly.
The following list describes possible values for the parameter:

item.para: Web service method output parameters, plus the return type, if not void, at index zero.

summary.para: Generates internal type mappings for information that is gathered from a Web service method.

returns.para: Internal .NET Framework type mappings to the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

Docs.param: An XML element name produced from the Web service method.
An XML element namespace produced from the Web service method.
An array of .NET Framework code entities that belong to a Web service method.
true to indicate that elements that correspond to WSDL message parts should be enclosed in an extra wrapper element in a SOAP message; otherwise, false.
true to indicate an RPC-style Web service binding; false to indicate a document-style Web service binding or a SOAP header.

true to indicate that a generated deserializer should check for the expected qualified name of the wrapper element; otherwise, false. This parameter's value is relevant only if the parameter's value is true.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping ImportTypeMapping (Type type);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping ImportTypeMapping(class System.Type type) cil managed

remarks.para: The XML Schema element is serialized using SOAP encoding.
You do not need to call the method directly.

summary.para: Generates a mapping to an XML Schema element for a .NET Framework type.

returns.para: Internal .NET Framework mapping of a type to an XML Schema element.

Docs.param: The .NET Framework type for which to generate a type mapping.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping ImportTypeMapping (Type type, string defaultNamespace);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping ImportTypeMapping(class System.Type type, string defaultNamespace) cil managed

remarks.para: The XML Schema element is serialized using SOAP encoding.
You do not need to call the method directly.

summary.para: Generates a mapping to an XML Schema element for a .NET Framework type.

returns.para: Internal .NET Framework mapping of a type to an XML Schema element.

Docs.param: The .NET Framework type for which to generate a type mapping.
The default XML namespace to use.

MemberSignature.Value: public void IncludeType (Type type);
.method public hidebysig instance void IncludeType(class System.Type type) cil managed

remarks.para: You do not need to call the method directly.

summary.para: Places mappings for a type in the instance's context for later use when import methods are invoked.

Docs.param: The .NET Framework type for which to save type mapping information.

MemberSignature.Value: public void IncludeTypes (System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider provider);
.method public hidebysig instance void IncludeTypes(class System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider provider) cil managed

summary.para: Places mappings for derived types in the instance's context for later use when import methods are invoked.

Docs.param: An reflection object that contains custom attributes that are derived from the attribute.
